thread.section_title: WebsiteBox.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WebsiteBox.com | websitebox.com
thread.title: Connie

author: Connie
title: Connie
text: The assistance provided by Josh was excellent. Actually, the few times I have had to call, everyone was helpful. This site is really self explanatory and user friendly. I must admit, I am a bit, okay, a lot terrified of building a website. However, my ConnieCooperRealtor.com website is just gorgeous. I have just launched it and am excited for the feedback from my friends and potential clients. If you have a need for a website, this is the way to go. Best of luck to all small business people who are working hard to make a living!
